p: Observational studies on the association of ZIKV and GBS have many limitations, and selection bias due to non-random selection is a significant issue, as is the loss of follow up and the lack of adjustment for overall ZIKV prevalence in a given region [ 24]. In this study, we did find a higher prevalence of positive ZIKV PCR compared to studies done in Puerto Rico [ 14], and French Polynesia [ 7].
